resources.string: Warning: Stats MUST add up to 12
"There is no greater weapon than a prepared mind." -Zhuge Liang"
"If you know the enemy and know yourself you need not fear the result of a hundred battle." -Sun Tzu
"If you're afraid - don't do it, - if you're doing it - don't be afraid!" -Genghis Khan
"There is nothing impossible to him who will try." -Alexander the Great
"Victory belongs to the most persevering." -Napoleon Bonaparte
"Experience is the teacher of all things." -Julius Caesar
"What is at a peak is certain to decline. He who shows his hand will certainly be defeated. He who can prevail in battle by taking advantage of his enemy's doubts is invincible." -Cao Cao
"I will either find a way or make one." - Hannibal Barca
"Take calculated risks. That is quite different from being rash." -George Patton
"In a man-to-man fight, the winner is he who has one more round in his magazine." -Erwin Rommel
In light of your recent victories, you are now capable of wielding greater power.
The hour to retreat has passed. Victory belongs solely to those willing to take risks.
